Package Timetable

Class Timetable

Object
Timetable
public class Timetable
extends Object
An object that will store and display the StudentAcc's registered courses Also used to manage adding courses by checking if the course the student wants to clashes with anything else
Since:
2020-11-25
Version:
1.0
Author:
Goh Wei Pin

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private HashMap<String,​ModType> courseHash
    The timetable will also have an instance of the HashMap which stores what this student is taking a particular course as
    private ArrayList<CourseIndex> coursestaken
    The Timetable object stores an instance of the courses taken by the student in order to keep track of the registered courses
    private String[][] timetable
    This 2D array will manage the time slots of the student for the purpose of adding courses

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Timetable​(ArrayList<CourseIndex> c, HashMap<String,​ModType> courseHash)
    This creates the timetable object based on the student's current registered courses The timetable is also created here.

  • Method Summary

    void addIndex​(CourseIndex c)
    This a CourseIndex to this student's timetable

    This method is to check if this student's timetable is able to fit the new index to add

    Prints the timetable

  • Field Details

    • coursestaken

      private ArrayList<CourseIndex> coursestaken
      The Timetable object stores an instance of the courses taken by the student in order to keep track of the registered courses

    • timetable

      private String[][] timetable
      This 2D array will manage the time slots of the student for the purpose of adding courses

    • courseHash

      private HashMap<String,​ModType> courseHash
      The timetable will also have an instance of the HashMap which stores what this student is taking a particular course as

  • Constructor Details

    • Timetable

      public Timetable​(ArrayList<CourseIndex> c, HashMap<String,​ModType> courseHash)
      This creates the timetable object based on the student's current registered courses The timetable is also created here. It is a 5 by 14 2D String array where each column will be 5 days of the week and the 14 rows are all the available periods in a day
      Parameters:
      c - The ArrayList of courseIndex objects that the student is currently taking
      courseHash - Stores information on how this student is taking the mod (CORE,GERPE_LA,GERPE_STS,GERPE_BM,UE or MPE)

  • Method Details

    • checkEmptySlot

      public boolean checkEmptySlot​(CourseIndex c)
      This method is to check if this student's timetable is able to fit the new index to add
      Parameters:
      c - The CourseIndex to check if it can be added
      Returns:
      True if the student's timetable can accomodate the new course index, otherwise false

    • addIndex

      public void addIndex​(CourseIndex c)
      This a CourseIndex to this student's timetable
      Parameters:
      c - This is the CourseIndex the student will be adding to the timetable

    • printTimetable

      public void printTimetable()
      Prints the timetable
